## Matrix3x3.invert() method

Inverts a Matrix3x3

**Signature:**

```typescript
static invert(matrix: Matrix3x3, result?: Matrix3x3): Matrix3x3;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  matrix | [Matrix3x3](doc/markdown/./base.matrix3x3.md) | The matrix to be inverted. |
|  result | [Matrix3x3](doc/markdown/./base.matrix3x3.md) | _(Optional)_ The output matrix (can be the same as matrix). if not specified, a new matrix will be created. |

**Returns:**

[Matrix3x3](doc/markdown/./base.matrix3x3.md)

The output matrix
